name: Town Trials [Alpha]
description:
TOWN TRIALS {Alpha}

Warning: This game is in extreme-Alpha version. Basically, there's many glitches, un-added features, rough movement, weird / no music, and sloppy controls. You can get a general feel of how the final game may look, but please keep in mind that this is a VERY rough preview version.

Welcome to Town Trials! Do your best to collect as many power-ups in Town as you can in order to get the best score on the Minigame at the end! You will have 1-2 minutes to roam around the Town, where you must avoid obstacles as you collect power ups to increase your Speed and other stats!

- Randomly Generated City and Power ups!

- Speed, Turn, Jump and Health Powerups. Grab them before they dissapear on you!

- Mini game race scene at the end!
